name: Car Sun Shade Side Window, 2 Pcs Blackout Car Window Shade for Baby Privacy with Storage Net Pockets Auto Curtains 7 Suction Cups for Heat/UV Protection Sun Block Covers
short_description: Block 99% Sun Glare and UV Rays:Our car window shades are made of 3-layer composite fabric, very thick and soft. Opaque and fully shading, it can effectively block 99% of the sun, heat and UV rays, and keep you and your family cool and comfortable all the time. Only for rear side windows when driving! Please do not use it for front windows to block the driver's sight.

Net Storage Pockets Designed for Convenience: Our car sun shade is designed with 3 net pockets, which can store small and light items such as tissue, towels, lipstick and other cosmetics, handheld fan,etc. Make it easier for you and your family to travel. PLEASE NOTE the pockets hold heavy items may cause the suction cup to fall off.

Powerful Suction Cups:Our car sun shade with 7 powerful suction cups,which can be firmly attached to the window glass. If the suction cup is easily fall off,it may be due to compression during transportation or Long Term exposure to the sun that caused the suction cup to deform. Please remove the suction cup and soak it in hot water until it expands. Before using the sunshade, it is recommended to clean the car window glass so that the suction cup can adhere more firmly.

ABOUT THE CURTAIN SIZE: The SIZE of this car window shade is 26.7"x20". PLEASE NOTE It is NOT suitable for Mazda's rear windows and other vehicles with very small windows（Before purchasing, PLEASE measure the size of your car window）It is fits standard passenger cars with normal sized windows, SUV, Minivans, MPV and Truck.

Easy To Install: Using method: 1.Clean the car window glass(dust can reduce the suction power); 2. Press the suction cups with some force to make it tightly adhere to the glass. Since this sunshade is soft cloth without any hard components, you can easily fold it and store it in any grid. Attention: Please do not roll Windows up and down while using the sunshade. Remove the suction cups of the lower half before you roll the window.
